title: A kind of method and system of the eye movement tracking interaction of near-eye display device
assignees: Magic Scorpion Technology Wuhan Co ltd

events.title: Application filed by Wuhan Scorpio Technology Co Ltd

classifications.description: Interaction techniques based on graphical user interfaces [GUI] for the control of specific functions or operations, e.g. selecting or manipulating an object, an image or a displayed text element, setting a parameter value or selecting a range

abstract: The invention belongs to near-eye display device applied technical fields, disclose a kind of method and system of the eye movement tracking interaction of near-eye display device, Eye-controlling focus is carried out using the eye movement tracking mould group in near-eye display device, is mapped to near-eye display device optical imagery button screen coordinate position after carrying out calculation processing to the eye movement information of acquisition；Button screen is imaged to click, executes the interactive function program after interaction success.Operation of the present invention interactive experience sense is more preferable: selecting in contrast to the blink of existing eye movement interaction, the present invention greatly reduces attention of the user during interactive controlling carried out by eyeball, the cognitive load on subjective consciousness is reduced simultaneously, the muscle of simple eye blink will not be controlled uncoordinated and bring is uncomfortable；In contrast to gesture identification interactive controlling, advantage of the invention is that concealment height is convenient without losing operation, suitable for the application scenarios required to privacy.
claims:
1. a kind of method of the eye movement tracking interaction of near-eye display device, which is characterized in that the eye movement of the near-eye display device
Tracking interactive method includes:
      Have eye movement tracing module using near-eye display device and carry out eyeball tracking, calculation processing is carried out to the eye movement information of acquisition
After be mapped to head-mounted display optical imagery button screen coordinate position；
      The optical imagery button screen coordinate position of near-eye display device receives click commands of the peripheral hardware hardware by Bluetooth transmission；
      Optical imagery button screen clicking operation is carried out again, executes interactive program.

2. the method for the eye movement tracking interaction of near-eye display device as described in claim 1, which is characterized in that nearly eye, which is shown, to be set
The method of standby eye movement tracking interaction specifically includes:
      Step 1: the computer system of near-eye display device obtains human eye ball in near-eye display device by eye movement tracing module
The mapping point of sight intersection point on optical imagery screen；The eye movement tracing module integrated in near-eye display device obtains human eye ball figure
Picture identifies eye image and calculates eye movement vector, obtains the eye movement coordinates of motion；
      During wherein eye movement vector obtains, using pupil-corneal reflection spot method or MEMS eyeball tracking technology, by human eye
Motor behavior digitlization is converted into the electronic signal of computer system calculating, and is calculated by algorithm and obtain people's blinkpunkt close
Mapping relations on the optical imagery screen of eye display equipment；It is aobvious in the optical imagery of near-eye display device according to mapping relations
Show the visual feedback that human eye fixation point is presented on device；
      Step 2: it obtains the operational order of hardware external equipment: setting radio magnetic wave communication module, nearly eye in near-eye display device
Show that equipment receives the click from hardware external equipment by radio magnetic wave communication module and confirms wireless signal instruction, instruction
Near-eye display device is transferred to by hardware external equipment in the form of radio magnetic wave signal；
      Step 3: completing to click the button in the operation interface on near-eye display device optical imagery screen, executes interaction journey
Sequence.

3. the method for the eye movement tracking interaction of near-eye display device as claimed in claim 2, which is characterized in that set outside hardware
It is standby obtain click behavior signal after, signal processing is carried out by integrated processor, will treated signal with Bluetooth matching side
Formula is sent to the bluetooth module of near-eye display device；
      Electromagnetic wave signal includes Bluetooth signal, wifi signal, infrared signal；
      The shape of mapping point is arbitrarily replaced.

4. a kind of eye of the near-eye display device of the method for the eye movement tracking interaction for implementing near-eye display device described in claim 1
Dynamic tracking interactive system, which is characterized in that the eye movement of near-eye display device tracks interactive system and includes:
      Near-eye display device and hardware external equipment；
      Near-eye display device is used to interact the selection at interface by eye movement tracing equipment；
      Hardware external equipment, and near-eye display device bluetooth connection, for confirming click behavior.

5. the eye movement of near-eye display device as claimed in claim 4 tracks interactive system, which is characterized in that
      The hardware external equipment is intended to be worn in user hand, the life with the wrist, palm, finger, hand body engineering science of user
Reason state matches.

6. the eye movement of near-eye display device as claimed in claim 4 tracks interactive system, which is characterized in that
      Near-eye display device is intelligent glasses, and intelligent glasses include:
      Carry out the eye movement tracing module of eyeball tracking；
      The optical imagery screen that the information of operation interface or Application Program Interface is presented；
      The calculation processing module of calculation processing is carried out to the eye movement tracked information of acquisition；
      For receiving the bluetooth module of the Bluetooth signal of hardware external equipment transmission；
      It is integrated on bluetooth module, what is be used for sends and receivees the signal receiver of Bluetooth signal.

7. the eye movement of near-eye display device as claimed in claim 4 tracks interactive system, which is characterized in that hardware external equipment
Include:
      Obtain the hardware adaptor key of click behavior signal；
      Click behavior signal is received, the processor of signal processing is carried out；
      By treated, signal is in a manner of Bluetooth matching or other wireless radio transmission forms are sent to the Bluetooth transmission of bluetooth module
Module.

8. the eye movement of near-eye display device as claimed in claim 6 tracks interactive system, which is characterized in that the optical imagery
Screen shows equipment for being integrated in head；
      Hardware external equipment is that intelligent TV set, projector, the LED with display imaging function show large-size screen monitors, plate.

9. a kind of calculating of the method for the eye movement tracking interaction for realizing near-eye display device described in claims 1 to 3 any one
Machine program.

10. a kind of information of the method for the eye movement tracking interaction for realizing near-eye display device described in claims 1 to 3 any one
Data processing terminal.

11. a kind of computer readable storage medium, including instruction, when run on a computer, so that computer executes such as
The method of the eye movement tracking interaction of near-eye display device described in claim 1-3 any one.
